title: Community in quest
creator_credit: Extension Media Center, University of California, Los Angeles, National Institute of Mental Health (U.S.) and Lyn Littman
brief_description: Depicts the political realities that can prevent much needed drug programs from operating in a town. In this film the city leaders are frightened when their traditional values are threatened by unknown methods and they react negatively to a drug program which utilises sensitivity and role playing techniques.
